io.requery.sql

Interface Mapping

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericMapping

    public interface Mapping
    Defines the mapping between java class types and FieldType instances which determines how they are stored in a SQL database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldType mapAttribute(Attribute<?,?> attribute)
      Get the mapped storage type mapping for a given type Attribute.

    • Method Detail

      • putType

        <T> Mapping putType(Class<? super T> type,
                    FieldType<T> fieldType)
        Map a specific java class type to a FieldType instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the mapped type
        Parameters:
        type - non null java class type
        fieldType - non null storage type
        Returns:
        mapping instance

      • replaceType

        <T> Mapping replaceType(int sqlType,
                        FieldType<T> replacementType)
        Replace the default mapping from a FieldType to a another FieldType. If the basic type is not mapped then a mapping will be added.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the mapped type
        Parameters:
        sqlType - Types to replace
        replacementType - non null replacement type
        Returns:
        mapping instance

      • mapAttribute

        FieldType mapAttribute(Attribute<?,?> attribute)
        Get the mapped storage type mapping for a given type Attribute.
        Parameters:
        attribute - attribute non null attribute
        Returns:
        the mapped FieldType

      • read

        <A> A read(Expression<A> expression,
           ResultSet results,
           int column)
    throws SQLException
        Given the expression read it from ResultSet instance.
        Type Parameters:
        A - type to read
        Parameters:
        expression - expression to read
        results - ResultSet instance
        column - column index
        Returns:
        the read type.
        Throws:
        SQLException - on a failure to read from the ResultSet

        <A> void write(Expression<A> expression,
               PreparedStatement statement,
               int index,
               A value)
        throws SQLException
        Given the expression bind it into a JDBC PreparedStatement.
        Type Parameters:
        A - type to be bound
        Parameters:
        expression - to bind
        statement - prepared statement instance
        index - statement index
        value - value
        Throws:
        SQLException - on a failure to set the expression on the PreparedStatement
